description.value:
You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Bo Staff], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Dueling Cape], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Spiked Chain], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Sword Cane], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Whip].

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.
